definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: The fine structure parameters were calculated using a least-squares fitting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用最小二乘法拟合技术严格地计算了精细结构参数。

sentences.english: From now on, we need to be more mobile and flexible, carefully choosing battle opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 今后，我们要更加机动灵活，精细地寻求。

sentences.english: And, it is helping his fine-motor skills, too.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这还能帮助他培养精细动作技能。

sentences.english: Used to take the place of hyphen in many occasions when finer typography is required.
sentences.chinese: 很多时，配合精细的排字要求，就用它来代替连字号。

sentences.english: The amplitude and group delay characteristics can be controlled exactly.
sentences.chinese: 对幅频特性和群时延特性进行精细调整。

sentences.english: SAFC is considered a top 10 fine chemical company.
sentences.chinese: SAFC被认为是前10个精细化工公司。

sentences.english: The building is wrapped in a fine, almost scaly veil of stainless steel wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑被包裹在很精细的类似鳞片状的不锈钢丝网内。

sentences.english: They may, for example, be technology-independent or technology-specific.
sentences.chinese: 例如，他们可能是技术独立的或者精细技术的。

sentences.english: Having relinquished all attachment to the five khandhas, the citta is exceedingly refined at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 心已经舍弃了对五蕴的执取，在这个阶段极其精细。

sentences.english: The newly unearthed copper vase is pleasing to the eye and engraved with delicate and intricate traditional designs.
sentences.chinese: 新出土的铜花瓶造型优美，刻有精细复杂的传统图案。

sentences.english: Objective To find a way for finer lower face re-contouring.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探寻更精细的下面部轮廓整形方法。

sentences.english: A new thought on comparative of study molecule structure of fulvic acid;
sentences.chinese: 本文应用酶法研究了牡蛎糖原的精细分子结构。

sentences.english: Documents produced relatively fine mesh, low-configuration of the computer used with caution.
sentences.chinese: 文件网格制作比较精细，低配置电脑慎用。

sentences.english: Fine accolades from a horseman of Bob Battaglia's distinction.
sentences.chinese: 从骑手鲍勃巴塔利亚的区别精细的赞誉。

sentences.english: Petrophysical facies is a new and important concept for reservoir evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 岩石物理相是进行储层精细评价的重要概念。

sentences.english: And Chaucer, of course, is laughing at this over-refinement.
sentences.chinese: 当然，乔叟是在笑话这些礼仪过分精细。

definition: according to a pattern/regular/orderly/structured/neat and tidy
